about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Zeb Khan, a full-stack developer from Pakistan currently studying at HAL Tokyo. I'm dedicated to creating user-centric web applications while continuously expanding my expertise in both frontend and backend technologies.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.description: My professional approach centers on maintaining composure under pressure and implementing methodical problem-solving strategies. I demonstrate resilience when confronting challenges and value consistency throughout my professional development.
